text: Ngoko ke wena memela abantu kuloo (nkolo ka-Allâh) uhlale useNdleleni ethe Tye njengoko uyalelwe, ungalandeli (izinto) abakekelele ngakuzo koko wena yithi : “Mna ndikholwe koko kutyhilwe nguAllâh kwisiBhalo (i’Kur’ân), yaye ndiyalelwe ukuba ndenze ubulungisa phakathi kwenu. UAllâh yiNkosi yethu ekwayiNkosi yenu. Thina sinezenzo zethu nani ninezenzo zenu akukho ngxoxo phakathi kwethu nani. UAllâh Uza kusibuyisela (kuye) sonke yaye kukuye apho isiphelo sohambo sikhoyo.”
